## About This Project

This site documents insights and lessons learned from contributing 90+ pull requests to 20+ open-source projects. It explores software quality, engineering practices at scale and effective collaboration in distributed teams.

### What You'll Find Here

- **Technical deep-dives** into code quality and project decisions
- **Practical lessons** from real-world contributions
- **Best practices** for effective open-source collaboration
- **Reflections** on engineering at scale
